item.title: You can have SASS asset pipelines in Hugo
item.description: Which lets you build a CSS stylesheet via something like: {{ $style := resources.Get "css/main.scss" | resources.ToCSS }} <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ $style.Permalink }}"> This is rather nice as you get the usual live reloading functionality when using hugo server. In previous Hugo projects, I had a separate process for rebuilding CSS, which can now be factored away. This feature is part of Hugo’s asset pipeline functionality and has been available since v0.
